rComments: This class is hard and time consuming no doubt about it, but if you put the work in you will learn a lot and feel very rewarded in the end. Barry is a great at what he does. The class could be incredibly dry, but Barry makes it more than bearable. He is funny and makes what could be a boring, intimidating, dry class, into a class worth taking.

You rarely need to read the textbook, I wouldn't of bought it if I knew that in advance. He gives great study guides for the tests (easiest part of the course, with curve too). The lab section was difficult and extremely time consuming(but totally doable) but that's where you learn the most. I recommend this course-pass no pass is the way to go

Barry does an excellent job of designing engaging lectures from subject matter that would otherwise be unavoidably dry & esoteric. The lab is where the rubber meets the road & as far as I could see he designed every one of them himself (an obviously herculean endeavor!) Great guest speakers too; one of the most valuable courses I've taken.
super helpful and easy to approach for help, great lecturer for the subject matter being taught. Very informative!
